name: Larrys Mod: Fun Gun Reloaded
description:
Larrys Mod: Fun Gun Reloaded Controls

W/Up/Space - Jump
A/Left - Move Left
S/Rigth - Move Rigth

Left Mouse Button - Grab Objects
Rigth Mouse Button - Freeze Grabbed Objects
E + Mouse Movement - Rotate Grabbed Objects

Q - Spawn Objects

Used Open Source Software Main
  • Blender – Asset Creation
  • git, GitLab – Versioning
  • Godot – Game Engine
  • Mumble – Team Communication
  • Taiga – Project Management
Other
  • Audacity – Sound recording and editing
  • Firefox, Chromium - Testing Web Version
  • GIMP – Texture Editing
  • Krita – Concept Art
  • OBS - Debugging Purposes
  • Ubuntu – OS
  • VLC - Debugging Purposes
